verses.text: Answer \w my|strong="H1732"\w* cry, God, \w my|strong="H1732"\w* defender. Often from straits you \w have|strong="H1732"\w* \w brought|strong="H1732"\w* me \w to|strong="H1732"\w* spacious places. So now show me \w your|strong="H1732"\w* favour \w and|strong="H1732"\w* hear \w my|strong="H1732"\w* prayer.

\w How|strong="H8085"\w* \w long|strong="H8085"\w*, \w you|strong="H7121"\w* proud \w people|strong="H6862"\w*, \w will|strong="H8085"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* honour \w be|strong="H2603"\w* stained \w by|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* slanders \w you|strong="H7121"\w* love, \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* lies \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w you|strong="H7121"\w* follow? \qs Selah\qs*

See! \w The|strong="H5704"\w* 
d Lord
d* \w has|strong="H4100"\w* shown \w me|strong="H1245"\w* \w his|strong="H1245"\w* wonderful kindness: \w the|strong="H5704"\w* 
d Lord
d* hears, \w when|strong="H5704"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* call \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w him|strong="H1245"\w*.

Sin \w not|strong="H3045"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* anger: \w but|strong="H3588"\w* speak \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H8085"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* bed, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w still|strong="H3588"\w*. \qs Selah\qs*
Offer true sacrifice, trust \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \nd Lord\nd*.

Many \w are|strong="H3068"\w* longing \w for|strong="H3068"\w* fortune \w to|strong="H3068"\w* smile. \w Lift|strong="H3068"\w* upon us \w the|strong="H3068"\w* light \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* face.

\w You|strong="H6440"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w put|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* heart, \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* deeper \w joy|strong="H5921"\w* \w than|strong="H2896"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w theirs|strong="H5921"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* corn \w and|strong="H3068"\w* wine \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w abundance|strong="H7227"\w*.

\w So|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H5414"\w* peace \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* \w lie|strong="H5414"\w* \w down|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H1715"\w* sleep; \w for|strong="H6256"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*, \nd Lord\nd*, keep \w me|strong="H5414"\w* safe.
